message:
Full Body Lower

Warm-Up:
- Light cardio: 5min
- Leg swings: 1x10
- Arm circles: 1x10

Workout:
- Goblet squat: 2x12-15
- DB RDL: 2x12-15
- DB bench press: 2x12-15

Core:
- Plank: 3x20-30s

Cooldown:
- Static stretching: 5min

Notes: Rest 60-90s between sets. RPE 5-6 (light weight). Movement quality is the priority — if form breaks down, reduce weight immediately.
qualityNotes: Section structure: Warm-Up, Workout, Core, Cooldown
Compact format: setsxreps for strength, time for cardio/core
Notes section includes rest, RPE, and key coaching cue
Beginner-appropriate: low volume (2 sets), conservative intensity

message:
Full Body Upper

Warm-Up:
- Light cardio: 5min
- Band pull-apart: 2x15
- Scapular shrug: 2x10

Workout:
- DB bench press: 2x12-15
- Seated cable row: 2x12-15
- Lat pulldown: 2x12-15

Core:
- Dead bug: 3x10/side

Cooldown:
- Static stretching: 5min

Notes: Rest 60-90s between sets. RPE 5-6. Tempo: 3-1-1 (3sec down, 1sec pause, 1sec up) — builds control and body awareness.
qualityNotes: Tempo cue in Notes (3-1-1) — important for Week 1 learning

message:
Full Body Balanced

Warm-Up:
- Light cardio: 5min

Workout:
- Goblet squat: 2-3x12-15
- DB RDL: 2-3x12-15
- DB bench press: 2-3x12-15
- Seated cable row: 2-3x12-15
- DB shoulder press: 2x10-12

Core:
- Bird dog: 3x8/side

Conditioning (Optional):
- Zone 2 cardio: 10min

Cooldown:
- Static stretching: 5min

Notes: Rest 60-90s. RPE 5-6. Add third set if exercises felt easy earlier this week. Celebrate completing Week 1!
qualityNotes: New exercise: DB shoulder press (introduced Friday)

message:
Full Body Lower

Warm-Up:
- Light cardio: 5min
- Leg swings: 1x10
- Arm circles: 1x10

Workout:
- Goblet squat: 3x12-15
- DB RDL: 3x12-15
- DB bench press: 3x12-15
- Seated cable row: 3x12-15

Core:
- Plank: 3x40-45s

Cooldown:
- Static stretching: 5min

Notes: Rest 60-90s. RPE 6-7 (increase from Week 4). Track your weights: Goblet Squat __lbs, RDL __lbs, Bench __lbs, Row __lbs. If you hit 3x15 with clean form, add 5-10lbs next Monday.
qualityNotes: Volume increase: 3 sets (vs 2 sets in Week 1)

message:
Full Body Upper

Warm-Up:
- Light cardio: 5min
- Band pull-apart: 2x15
- Scapular shrug: 2x10

Workout:
- DB bench press: 3x12-15
- Chest-supported row: 3x12-15
- Lat pulldown: 3x12-15
- DB shoulder press: 3x10-12

Core:
- Dead bug: 3x12/side

Cooldown:
- Static stretching: 5min

Notes: Rest 60-90s. RPE 6-7. Track weights for all exercises. Same weight as Monday for bench press — consistency helps track progress.
qualityNotes: Tracking emphasized: 'Track weights for all exercises'
Consistency note: 'Same weight as Monday for bench press'
No tempo cues (Week 1 had 3-1-1, Week 5 assumes mastery)

message:
Full Body Balanced

Warm-Up:
- Light cardio: 5min

Workout:
- Goblet squat: 3x12-15
- DB RDL: 3x12-15
- DB bench press: 3x12-15
- Seated cable row: 3x12-15
- DB shoulder press: 3x10-12

Core:
- Bird dog: 3x10/side

Conditioning (Optional):
- Zone 2 cardio: 10-15min

Cooldown:
- Static stretching: 5min

Notes: Rest 60-90s. RPE 6-7. Review your log: Did you hit 3x15 on any exercise this week? If yes, add 5-10lbs next week (Week 6). Progressive overload in action!
qualityNotes: Volume now strict 3 sets (vs 2-3 in Week 1)
Weekly review prompt: 'Review your log: Did you hit 3x15?'

message:
Barbell Squat Intro

Warm-Up:
- Light cardio: 5min
- Bodyweight squat: 2x10

Workout:
- BB back squat: 3x10-12
- DB RDL: 3x12
- DB bench press: 3x12
- Seated cable row: 3x12

Core:
- Plank: 3x45s

Cooldown:
- Static stretching: 5min

Notes: Rest 90-120s for squats, 60-90s for other exercises. RPE 6-7. Start with JUST THE BAR (45lbs) for Set 1 of squats. If form is clean, add 10-20lbs for Sets 2-3. Film yourself (side angle). Focus: depth, chest up, knees tracking.
qualityNotes: Equipment transition: BB back squat (vs Goblet in W1, W5)
Rest increased: 90-120s for squats (vs 60-90s in W5)
Form checkpoints: 'depth, chest up, knees tracking'

message:
Barbell Bench Intro

Warm-Up:
- Light cardio: 5min
- Push-up: 2x10

Workout:
- BB bench press: 3x10-12
- Chest-supported row: 3x12
- Lat pulldown: 3x12
- DB shoulder press: 3x10

Core:
- Dead bug: 3x12/side

Cooldown:
- Static stretching: 5min

Notes: Rest 90-120s for bench, 60-90s for other exercises. RPE 6-7. Start with bar only (45lbs) for Set 1 of bench. If form is clean, add 10-20lbs for Sets 2-3. Spotter recommended. Film yourself (front angle). Focus: controlled descent, pause on chest, elbows ~45°.
qualityNotes: Equipment transition: BB bench press (vs DB in W1, W5)
Film lifts: 'front angle' (different from squat's side angle)
Form checkpoints: 'controlled descent, pause on chest, elbows ~45°'

message:
Deadlift Intro + Big Three

Warm-Up:
- Light cardio: 5min
- Light DB RDL: 2x10

Workout:
- BB deadlift: 3x8-10
- BB back squat: 3x10
- BB bench press: 3x10
- Seated cable row: 3x12

Core:
- Bird dog: 3x10/side

Cooldown:
- Static stretching: 5min

Notes: Rest 2min for deadlifts, 90-120s for squat/bench, 60-90s for rows. RPE 6-7. Deadlift: Start with bar + 25lbs per side (95lbs total), or just bar if that feels heavy. Film yourself (side angle). Focus: neutral spine, hips and shoulders rise together. Celebrate: You've learned the big three!
qualityNotes: Focus: 'Deadlift Intro + Big Three' (all three barbell lifts)
All three barbell lifts in one session (consolidation day)
Deadlift start weight: 'bar + 25lbs per side (95lbs total)'
